name: radiocalico
description: Proyecto web con Node.js y PostgreSQL

scripts.docker:dev: docker-compose -p radiocalico_dev --env-file env/.env.development -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.docker:dev:build: docker-compose -p radiocalico_dev --env-file env/.env.development -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:prod: docker-compose -p radiocalico_prod --env-file env/.env.production -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.docker:prod:build: docker-compose -p radiocalico_prod --env-file env/.env.production -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:down: docker-compose -p radiocalico_dev -f docker/docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -p radiocalico_prod -f docker/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.security:all: npm run security:audit && npm run security:lint
